T02D1989:185b-1: badzra bhee ra wa s'adha n'a ma ;
T02D1989:185b-3: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1989:185b-4: 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1989:185b-5: rab tu khros shing gdug pa 'dul //
T02D1989:185b-6: ma lus log pa'i bdud 'dul ba //
T02D1989:185b-7: zhal dang phyag drug mtshon cha 'dzin //
T02D1989:185b-8: ma he zhal la phyag 'tshal te /
T02D1989:185b-9: de yi sgrub pa'i rim pa zhig / bdag gis dran nas brtsam par bya //
T02D1989:185b-10: dang por yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bdag nyid khrus byas te stan bde ba la 'dug nas /
T02D1989:185b-11: aom badzra bh'ee ra badzva la dzva la h'um /
T02D1989:185b-13: bla ma dkon mchog la mchod pa rnams kyis yang
T02D1989:185b-14: dag par mchod nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs
T02D1989:185b-15: pa bya'o // aom aa bha b'a sva bha wa bi shuddha badzra tsa kra aa aa aam aa /
T02D1989:185b-16: zhes bya bas stong ba nyid bsgom mo //
T02D1989:185b-17: de nas bdag nyid yi ge aar gnas pa las
T02D1989:185b-18: de'i 'od ser gyis tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi
T02D1989:185b-19: steng du aa zhu ba las autpala 'khor los mtshan
T02D1989:185b-20: pa de zhub las bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo
T02D1989:185b-21: rje zhes bya ba sku mdog mthing nag g-yas na
T02D1989:185b-22: rdo rje g-yon na autpala 'dzin pa /
T02D1989:185b-23: gzhon nu'i cha lugs la rgyan gyis brgyan pa bsam mo //
T02D1989:185b-24: de'i thugs ka nas nyi ma la h'um gnas pa can du bsams te /
T02D1989:185b-25: h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra rgyun mi 'chad par byung bas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad mchod //
T02D1989:185b-27: zhe sdang gi skur gyur pa ni /
T02D1989:185b-28: zhal drug phyag rnam pa drug dang ldan pa /
T02D1989:185b-31: sku mdog mthing nag / mi mgo brgya'i do shal can /
T02D1989:185b-32: zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa /
T02D1989:185b-33: phyag drug g-yas g-yon gyi dang po keng rus kyi dbyug pa dang rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D1989:185b-34: g-yas g-yon gyi bar pa na mda' gzhu dang ral gri /
T02D1989:185b-35: tha ma na sna tshogs rdo rje dang mdung bsnams pa'o //
T02D1989:185b-36: de las tshad med pa bzhi'i khro bo 'phro ba can no //
T02D1989:185b-37: zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa bsgom /
T02D1989:185b-38: de'i thugs kar nyi ma'i steng du h'um bsams la /
T02D1989:186a-0: spyan drang ba la sogs pa rdzogs pa dang gsang sngags bzlas pa @186a * //
T02D1989:186a-2: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um /
T02D1989:186a-4: aom du: kha tshe da h'um h'um /
T02D1989:186a-6: de nas mtshan gyi sgo nas bstod do //
T02D1989:186a-7: gtor ma btang nas gshegs su gsol te ldang bar bya'o //
T02D1989:186a-8: bdag gis dge ba 'di byas pas //
T02D1989:186a-9: bla med byang chub thob par shog / rdo rje
T02D1989:186a-10: 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon aa sho ka
T02D1989:186a-13: // / pandi ta dharm'a shr'i mi tra dang /
